org.opends.server.tools.upgrade

Class LicenseFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.tools.upgrade.LicenseFile

  • public class LicenseFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents information about the license file. NOTE: the license file location must be kept in sync with build.xml and org.opends.quicksetup.LicenseFile.

    • Method Detail

      • exists

        public static boolean exists()
        Checks if the license file exists.
        Returns:
        true a license file license_to_accept.txt exists in the Legal directory in the top level installation directory false otherwise.

      • getText

        public static java.lang.String getText()
        Get the textual contents of the license file.
        Returns:
        the textual contents of the license file.

      • getApproval

        public static boolean getApproval()
        Get the license approval status.
        Returns:
        true if the license has been accepted by the user false otherwise.

      • setApproval

        public static void setApproval(boolean p_approved)
        Sets the license approval status.
        Parameters:
        p_approved - the license approval status

      • isAlreadyApproved

        public static boolean isAlreadyApproved()
        Indicate if the license had already been approved..
        Returns:
